answer:
Documents: Approval documents, notification documents, reports, conference materials, correspondences, fax/telex transmissions, bills, various records, drawings, microfilms, photographs, video/audio media, electronic mail, and any other documents and electromagnetic records handled in connection with Company business (excluding publications).
Disks: Electromagnetic recording media, including floppy disks, CD-Rs, and DVD-Rs.
Storage: Managing documents in any of the following methods and places for specified periods of time, referred to as "Stored Documents."
